settings.text: Backed by Science, Proven by Research

settings.heading: Cognitive Enhancement
settings.content: X harnesses AlphaSize® Alpha-GPC and Cognizin® Choline, both rigorously studied for their effects on brain health. Alpha-GPC, as per Parnetti 2001, is known to increase acetylcholine levels, enhancing memory and learning. Cognizin® Choline, supported by McGlade 2012, has been shown to improve focus and mental energy, crucial for higher cognitive functioning.

settings.heading: Focus and Learning
settings.subheading: Get deeper with your cognitive work.
settings.content: Key ingredients in X, like Bacognize® Bacopa Monnieri and KSM-66® Ashwagandha, have been the subject of extensive research. Kumar 2016's study on Bacopa Monnieri revealed its role in enhancing memory retention and attention, while Xing 2022 found Ashwagandha to significantly improve cognitive and psychomotor performance, essential for learning and focus.

settings.heading: Mood and Energy
settings.content: X's formulation includes RhodioLife® Rhodiola Rosea and SunTheanine® L-Theanine, both backed by substantial scientific findings. Gou-Ping 2018’s research on Rhodiola Rosea demonstrates its efficacy in reducing fatigue and enhancing mental performance, while Hidese 2019 shows L-Theanine's role in promoting relaxation without drowsiness, boosting mood and cognitive function

settings.heading: Stress Reduction and Brain Health
settings.content: SerinAid® Phosphatidylserine in X has been studied for its stress-reducing properties (Glade 2015), vital for brain health. Furthermore, ingredients like Ginkgo Biloba, backed by Silberstein 2011, support neurogenesis and cerebral blood flow, essential for overall brain health and resilience against cognitive decline.

settings.heading: Detailed Ingredient Science
settings.content: Delve deeper into the scientific research backing each ingredient in X. Understand how each component contributes to your brain's health, from clinical studies on AlphaSize® Alpha-GPC's impact on cognitive function to the neuroprotective effects of Huperzia Serrata. This comprehensive insight gives you a clear understanding of how X supports your brain health at a cellular level.

settings.text: Everything you need to know about X

settings.question: How do I know X will work for me?
settings.answer:
Every one of the 17 active ingredients in X has been proven through clinical research to benefit brain performance.

What that means is that most people will experience a significant benefit.†

Diet, exercise and sleep will also have a great impact on your brain performance.

settings.question: How does X work?
settings.answer:
Each active ingredient in X has its own mechanism of action, which has been proven to be effective in clinical studies.

Many of the ingredients boost levels of neurotransmitters such as dopamine, noradrenaline and acetylcholine—all three of which are critically important to focus, learning, brain energy and memory.

settings.question: Is X safe?
settings.answer:
We formulated X using the highest quality ingredients available.

It contains no harsh additives or stimulants.

Every ingredient has undergone rigorous testing, and every batch of X is thoroughly tested to ensure it is free of impurities.

settings.question: How long will it take for me to feel the effects of X?
settings.answer:
Most people experience a benefit within an hour of taking a full serving of X.

For some people, it may require taking it for a number of days to get the desired result.

We suggest taking it for a full two weeks before judging its effectiveness for you.

settings.question: How does the price per serving of X compare with other products?
settings.answer:
The price per serving for X is considerably less than Alpha Brain® Black Label or Qualia Mind®, even though X contains a much larger number of active ingredients than either of those.

X is more expensive, per serving, than most other brain supplements.

X is packed with ultra-premium ingredients to maximize the benefit on brain performance.

X was formulated to be the best, not the cheapest.

settings.question: Can I get my money back if I’m not satisfied?
settings.answer:
We have a no-hassle 90-day return policy.

Simply return the unused portion for a full refund.

To get a refund, email hello@xbrain.science.

settings.question: How much is shipping and how long will it take to get to me?
settings.answer:
Standard shipping to the continental US is free and takes 3 to 5 business days.

You can also select 2-day shipping at checkout for a fee.

In rare cases (10% of the time), 2-day shipping will take more than 2 days to arrive.
